job.title: React/React Native Engineer
job.description: Role: React/React Native Engineer Location: Remote - USA Type: Fulltime Job Description We are looking for a React/React Native Engineer with strong problem-solving skills. This position will play a key role in the continued development of our products, which have real-life impacts on tens of thousands of people per year. Requirements: Excellent communication skills A deep understanding of React Deep experience with React Native Experience with REST APIs Experience with version control, preferably Git Constantly strive to expand knowledge and stay current with new engineering tools Nice to Have/Want to Learn: Native Mobile Application Development experience Fastlane or other CI/CD Experience Automated testing experience If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347 . Looking forward to hearing from you!
